name: Snow Brothers - A Fan Game
description:
Fan art by melsnoodles

Toaplan's "Snow Brothers" was an arcade hit in the early-90s. So, we decided to recreate the game with a view towards adding our own twists to it to keep things interesting.

Fans of the original who are looking for some nostalgia or even something new should enjoy this game!

As we post demos and eventually the full game, we welcome any and all feedback and bug reports as we want to make this a solid experience for anyone who wants to play the game. In fact, we'd be extremely grateful for any such feedback!

Thanks for stopping by!

CONTROLS:

- WAD (or keyboard arrows) for up/left/right movement

- X (or I) to fire the player's projectile

- Space (or J or Z) to jump

- Stand next to a snowball and attack while pushing to kick it

- Stand under a snowball and jump to head-butt it

- S (or down keyboard arrow) to crouch (can't be carried away by rolling snowballs)

- Crouch + Jump to drop down a level
